modelr User’s Manual¶

Web Scripts¶

  • Stochastic Avo – stochastic modelling of avo response
  • Body Plot – models generic slabs of a 3 rock earth
  • Channel Plot – models a rounded channel in the earth
  • URL Plot – uses a png or svg from a url as an earth model
